text: Jiah Khan (born Nafisa Rizvi Khan, 20 February 1988 â€“ 3 June 2013) was a British-American-Indian actress that appeared in movies for Bollywood. Khan was born on 20 February 1988 into a Muslim family in New York City, New York. On 3 June 2013, she was found dead in her apartment in Sagar Sangeet building in Juhu, Mumbai after hanging herself. ==References== ==Other website== * Category:1988 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American Muslims Category:British movie actors Category:British Muslims Category:Indian movie actors Category:Suicides by hanging
title: Jiah Khan
